OColor Class Reference

Floating point color class with implicit RGB, HSV, CMYK access modes, conversion and color theory utils. More...

#include <OColor.h>

Detailed Description

Floating point color class with implicit RGB, HSV, CMYK access modes, conversion and color theory utils.

Based on Toxi's TColor class and his Java/Processing colorutils lib.

Adds the given BGR values as offsets to the current color.

OColor will clip at black or white.

bool OColor::isBlack (  ) 
Returns:

bool OColor::isWhite (  ) 
Returns:
true, if all rgb component values are equal and greater than OColor#WHITE_POINT
static vector<float> OColor::labToBGR ( float  l,
float  a,
float  b,
vector< float >  bgr 
) [inline, static]

Converts CIE Lab to BGR components.

First we have to convert to XYZ color space. Conversion involves using a white point, in this case D65 which represents daylight illumination.

Algorithm adopted from: http://www.easyrgb.com/math.php

Parameters:
l 
a 
b 
bgr 
Returns:
bgr vector
static vector<float> OColor::labToBGR ( float  l,
float  a,
float  b 
) [inline, static]

Converts CIE Lab to BGR components.

First we have to convert to XYZ color space. Conversion involves using a white point, in this case D65 which represents daylight illumination.

Algorithm adopted from: http://www.easyrgb.com/math.php

Parameters:
l 
a 
b 
Returns:
bgr vector
static vector<float> OColor::labToRGB ( float  l,
float  a,
float  b,
vector< float >  rgb 
) [inline, static]

Converts CIE Lab to RGB components.

First we have to convert to XYZ color space. Conversion involves using a white point, in this case D65 which represents daylight illumination.

Algorithm adopted from: http://www.easyrgb.com/math.php
